prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey, just wanted to check in and see how you’re doing!

Your delivery is scheduled for tomorrow between 2-4 PM. 

Reminder: Your dentist appointment is on Tuesday at 3 PM.

I’ve got your back for the presentation tomorrow. Let’s crush it!

Can you please confirm if you’re attending the meeting on Friday?

Just finished the book you recommended! It was amazing!

Hi! Looking forward to the concert this weekend. Let’s meet up beforehand!

Your OTP for accessing your account is 123456. 

I’ll be late to dinner tonight, stuck in traffic. Sorry!

Don't forget to pick up the groceries on your way home.

We’ve received your payment successfully. Thank you!

Hey, are we still on for brunch this Sunday?

Your subscription will renew on the 15th. Let us know if you want to make any changes.

Just a heads up, the office will be closed next Monday for the holiday.

Can you send me the report by EOD? Thanks!

Hope you’re having a great day! Let’s catch up soon.

Your package has been shipped and is on the way!

I’m thinking of trying that new café later. Want to join?

Your bank statement is ready for review in your online account.

Thanks for the update! I appreciate your prompt response.

Looking forward to the family reunion next month!

Just checking in to see if you received my last message.

Your flight is confirmed for next Wednesday at 10 AM.

I hope the kids are doing well! Let me know if you need anything.

Don’t forget about the charity event this Saturday at 5 PM.

Your feedback is important to us! Please take a moment to complete the survey.

I’m here if you need to talk. Just reach out whenever.

Please confirm your attendance at the meeting by Thursday. 

Your appointment has been successfully rescheduled to next week.

Thanks for the lovely dinner last night! Had a great time.

Your warranty will expire soon. Consider renewing it for continued coverage.

Just checking in: how’s the new job treating you?

The team will meet at 10 AM for the weekly catch-up.

I’ll send over the details for the project later today.

Hope the move is going smoothly! Let me know if you need help.

Your payment is due in three days. Please ensure it’s settled on time.

I’ve added you to the group chat for the upcoming event.

Your password has been successfully changed.

Excited for our road trip next month! Let’s start planning.

Thanks for your support during this time. It means a lot.

The event is full, but we’ll keep you updated on future opportunities.

Your feedback on our service helps us improve. Thank you!

I’ll be available for a call tomorrow after 1 PM.

The weather looks great for the picnic this weekend!

Your subscription has been successfully canceled as requested.

Can’t wait for the holiday party! Let’s make it memorable.

Just wanted to confirm our dinner plans for Saturday night.

Your account has been upgraded with additional features. Enjoy!

Did you hear back from the contractor yet? 

Thanks for the reminder! I’ll take care of that today.

Looking forward to seeing you at the wedding! 

Your library book is due back by Friday.
